mapper.select: SELECT SQL_CALC_FOUND_ROWS board_no , board_title, board_writer, board_changeThumbnail, board_content , board_hit , board_like , board_hate , board_date ,board_imgList,board_hashTag ,(SELECT count(*) FROM board) AS totalCount FROM board LIMIT #{limitValue}, 6

SELECT SQL_CALC_FOUND_ROWS board_no , board_title, board_writer, board_changeThumbnail, board_content , board_hit , board_like , board_hate , board_date ,board_imgList,board_hashTag FROM board WHERE
board_title LIKE concat('%' , #{searchWord} , '%')
board_hashTag LIKE concat('%#' , #{option}, ',%')
AND board_hashTag LIKE concat('%#' , #{option1}, ',%')
AND board_hashTag LIKE concat('%#' , #{option2}, ',%')
LIMIT #{scrollIndex}, 6
